task.title: Adding a Favicon in WebHelp Systems

context.p: You can add a custom favicon to your WebHelp system by simply using a parameter in the transformation scenario to point to your favicon image. This is available for DITA and DocBook WebHelp systems using WebHelp, WebHelp with Feedback, or WebHelp-Mobile transformation scenarios.
To add a favicon, follow these steps:

step.cmd: Locate the webhelp.favicon parameter and enter the file path that points to the image that will be use as the favicon.
